item.title: Arlen Specter To Cancel Independent Judiciary
item.description: In an attempt to overturn Marbury v. Madison, Senator Arlen Specter, a far-left Republican, intends to bring up two Supreme Court justices on perjury charges. (source, StLCofCC) Arlen Specter is an ass. This, children, is why we don’t feed the liberals!
